about_the_game:
Feral Metaverse drops you into a strange, untamed wasteland where survival hinges on the unexpected. Here, players don’t just cooperate—they fuse into chaotic Group Hugs, climbing, pushing, and pulling each other to navigate the shifting terrain. Mark your territory with collaborative sand drawings, scream into the void, or vanish by hiding your head in the dirt.

This is a world where you can run on all fours, ride your fellow players, and operate medieval machinery to uncover hidden secrets. The landscape is ever-changing, with the potential for cataclysmic events always lurking. In Feral Metaverse, the line between chaos and harmony blurs, creating an experience as enigmatic as it is exhilarating.

Feral Metaverse is the latest game by artist Theo Triantafyllidis, creator of Self Portrait (Interior) 2016, Gecko Ridemption 2017 and Pastoral 2019.

Gameplay and Features

Feral Metaverse throws you into a wild, untamed multiplayer playground where survival means getting weird and working together. Here’s what you’re in for:

  • Third-Person Madness: Roam wild and experience this unpredictable wasteland from a third-person perspective.

  • Multiplayer Mayhem: Team up with other players in a wordless world where cooperation is key, and every gesture counts.

  • Group Hug Antics: Stack up, climb on each other, and create towering human pyramids to tackle obstacles and puzzles.

  • True Character Randomization: Forget about character customization, you don't get to pick anything, you just get an avatar assigned randomly and have to become them.

  • Gallop on All Fours: Ditch two legs for four as you race across the landscape like a feral beast.

  • Collaborative Sand Art: Mark your territory or craft collaborative masterpieces by peeing and drawing in the sand.

  • Primal Screaming: Let loose with guttural screams to communicate or just express the raw chaos inside.

  • Player Riding: Hop on a buddy’s back and ride them across the dunes for a laugh or a tactical move.

  • Expansive Open World: Roam the sprawling, shifting terrain of The Feral Plains littered with the mysterious remnants of climate extinction. Immerse yourself in a visually striking world full of bizarre characters and landscapes that scream originality.

  • Ever-Shifting World: Brace yourself for an environment that’s constantly changing, with the looming threat of colossal, biblical disasters.

Feral Metaverse isn’t just a game—it’s a social experiment where every player interaction shapes the wild ride. Ready to dive into the madness and find out what feral truly means?

content_descriptors.notes: Some player avatars are partially nude. Characters can pee to draw together on sand.

reviews:
“Feral Metaverse subverts our expectations of typical game mechanics by assigning each button not to jump, punch or shoot but to grab, scream, urinate or bury your head in the ground. It comes across as a farcical, somewhat glib commentary on how people are reduced to their most primitive selves in virtual spaces. However, there is also hope”
Financial Times

“Harking back to a primordial, pre-language state of existence, Feral Metaverse is Triantafyllidis’s attempt to reimagine Facebook’s dull and widely-mocked vision of the metaverse as outlined in Mark Zuckerberg’s 2021 keynote.”
Fact Magazine

“Feral Metaverse goes against the association between games and competition. Instead, each organically arising group must determine their objective, then complete it. Once you do, you can’t really play again.”
Artnet News
short_description: Feral Metaverse is an Online Multiplayer Game where players are dropped naked and voiceless into a bleak environment. Their only path to survival is kindness.
